articles.author: Ted Regencia
articles.title: Afghanistan, Pakistan agree to immediate ceasefire after talks in Doha - Al Jazeera
articles.description: South Asian neighbours also agreed to hold follow-up meetings in coming days to ensure peace deal’s implementation.
articles.content:
Afghanistan and Pakistan have agreed to an immediate ceasefire in talks mediated by Qatar and Turkiye following a week of fierce and deadly clashes along their disputed border.
